quotes.quote: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
quotes.speaker: David Allen

quotes.quote: The future is not set. There is no fate but what we make for ourselves.
quotes.speaker: John Connor

quotes.quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Ben

quotes.quote: I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse.
quotes.speaker: Don Vito Corleone

quotes.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
quotes.speaker: Yoda
quotes.source: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.speaker: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads.
quotes.speaker: Dr. Emmett Brown

quotes.quote: I think we need a bigger boat.
quotes.speaker: Martin Brody

quotes.quote: Why do we fall? So we can learn to pick ourselves up.
quotes.speaker: Thomas Wayne

quotes.quote: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
quotes.speaker: Forrest Gump

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.speaker: Dillon

quotes.quote: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
quotes.speaker: Batman

quotes.quote: The night is darkest just before the dawn.
quotes.speaker: Harvey Dent

quotes.quote: Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.
quotes.speaker: Petyr Baelish

quotes.quote: May the odds be ever in your favor.
quotes.speaker: Effie Trinket

quotes.quote: Hakuna Matata. It means no worries.
quotes.speaker: Timon & Pumbaa

quotes.quote: The past can hurt. But you can either run from it or learn from it.
quotes.speaker: Rafiki

quotes.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
quotes.speaker: Gandalf
quotes.source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
quotes.speaker: Galadriel
quotes.source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.speaker: Albus Dumbledore
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quotes.quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.speaker: Albus Dumbledore
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quotes.speaker: Severus Snape
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.quote: The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.
quotes.speaker: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
quotes.speaker: The Alchemist

quotes.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That's why it's called the present.
quotes.speaker: Master Oogway

quotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.speaker: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.speaker: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: I see now that the circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
quotes.speaker: Mewtwo

quotes.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
quotes.speaker: Howard Roark

quotes.quote: I have always depended on the kindness of strangers.
quotes.speaker: Blanche DuBois

quotes.quote: Nobody puts Baby in a corner.
quotes.speaker: Johnny Castle

quotes.quote: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
quotes.speaker: John Keating

quotes.quote: Every man dies, not every man really lives.
quotes.speaker: William Wallace

quotes.quote: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
quotes.speaker: Andy Dufresne

quotes.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.speaker: Andy Dufresne

quotes.quote: You either die a hero or live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
quotes.speaker: Harvey Dent

quotes.quote: I'm not a psychopath, I'm a high-functioning sociopath. Do your research.
quotes.speaker: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.quote: Clear eyes, full hearts, can't lose.
quotes.speaker: Coach Eric Taylor

quotes.quote: A Lannister always pays his debts.
quotes.speaker: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: I drink and I know things.
quotes.speaker: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.speaker: Bilbo Baggins

quotes.quote: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
quotes.speaker: Boromir
quotes.source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.speaker: Gandalf
quotes.source: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: With great power, there must also come great responsibility.
quotes.speaker: Uncle Ben

quotes.quote: I can do this all day.
quotes.speaker: Steve Rogers
Darth Vader
quotes.source: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

quotes.quote: May the Force be with you.
quotes.speaker: Various Characters

quotes.quote: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
quotes.speaker: Darth Vader

quotes.quote: To boldly go where no man has gone before.
quotes.speaker: Captain Kirk

quotes.quote: Come with me if you want to live.
quotes.speaker: Kyle Reese

quotes.quote: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
quotes.speaker: Rhett Butler

quotes.quote: I'm the king of the world!
quotes.speaker: Jack Dawson

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
quotes.speaker: Michael Corleone

quotes.quote: I'm walking here! I'm walking here!
quotes.speaker: Ratso Rizzo

quotes.quote: What we do in life echoes in eternity.
quotes.speaker: Maximus

quotes.quote: My mama always said life was like a box of chocolates.
quotes.speaker: Forrest Gump
